args:
It turns out Augus's plan was actually a cunning
trap—and when the party hits the road, they
find him waiting for them with a battalion of
combat androids! With the tide turning against
them, they have no choice but to fight.
Zethia, calm down! If you don't hold on,\nyou're gonna fall!
Eh, just a little something I slapped\ntogether. Pretty cool stuff, right?!
Yes, it is quite remarkable, but PLEASE\nkeep your eyes forward while piloting it!\n...Wait, what about Mordecai and Meene?
Mordecai's piloting the other one.\n...Er, are they not behind us?
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!\nMY WINGS ARE GOING TO COME OFF!
Very far behind us, technically.\nDo you think Meene will be all right?
If they're with us, then they're A-OK!
I don't mean to dampen your enthusiasm,\nbut are you certain this plan will work?
Nope! But we still gotta try, right?
Not really. Honestly, it's not that long ago\nwhere I would've taken Meene and ran.\nI'm not a big fan of people.
But meeting you and Mordecai has\nhelped me understand what it means\nto care for somebody.
Now I can't WAIT to see what the\nfuture holds for me!
I'm gonna meet all kinds of new people,\nlearn all kinds of new things,\nand get all KINDS of strong!
Er, that IS how it's gonna go, right, Zethia?
I thought I was going to die that entire\ntime. Are my wings still attached?
They are fine at present, though I would\nbe unsurprised if they suffer several holes\nif our current situation continues.
Those are combat androids—and a whole\nlot of 'em! Are they here to fight dragons?
I believe they are here for us!
I must thank all of you for coming.
Yes, I am on my way to you right now.\nIn the meantime, I'm speaking through\nthese androids.
You have been a rather tough nut\nto crack, my dear Ilia.

It's hard to believe a misanthrope like you
came all this way just to see the sights.
Perhaps you heard about some sort of
inhumane plan in the works, mmm?
Did you INTENTIONALLY let that\ninformation slip?!

Heaven forfend! Why, it would be madness
for me to speak our secret plans openly
when there is a genius like you around
who could be listening in.
I was merely doing what was necessary\nto carry out my mission.
If you happened to hear something and\nthen decided to show up... Well, I\nsuppose that is your mistake.
If it makes you feel better, I absolutely\nWAS planning to use those mana bombs\non the capital.
But depending on your decision here,\nthat may not prove necessary.
Yeah. You want me to open another gate.
Yes. Be of use to me, my dear alchemist.\nHelp me stand at the apex.
And if I do, you'll spare the city?
I will do more than spare them—I will\ngive you a place of honor in the new world\nwhere we humans rule supreme!
Is the world truly saved if it is ruled by\nsomeone who sees life as disposable?
He's right. That can't be the kind of future\nyou actually want.
The kind of future I want...
Heh. Friends are amazing, you know?\nThey help you understand things you\ndon't even know you don't get!
The only thing my parents left me\nwas the recipe for omega keys.
It's a memento of them, and you're not\ngetting ANY of it, jerk!
Then it seems negotiations have failed,\nleaving force as the only option.
